It is characterized by its striking, showy inflorescence composed of numerous small, bright yellow flowers arranged in a dense cluster. The plant typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as riverbanks and forest understories. Its leaves are simple, alternate, and often have a waxy texture to retain moisture.
